vital_signs.blood_pressure: can be normal (129/77 mmHg reported in one case)
vital_signs.temperature: can range from normal to elevated (37°C to 39°C reported)
vital_signs.pulse_rate: can be elevated (93 beats/min reported in one case)
vital_signs.respiratory_rate: can be elevated (20 breaths/min reported in one case)

physical_findings: Absence of neurologic deficits (in some cases)
Absence of skin abnormalities (in some cases)

lab_values.white_blood_cell_count: elevated (18,670 cells/μl and 14,840 cells/μl reported in one case)
lab_values.neutrophils: increased percentage (81.2% and 83% reported in one case)
lab_values.lymphocytes: decreased percentage (14.1% and 12% reported in one case)
lab_values.c_reactive_protein: elevated (20 mg/dl reported in one case)
lab_values.creatinine: normal (1.03 mg/dl reported in one case)
lab_values.aspartate_aminotransferase: normal (34 IU/l reported in one case)
lab_values.glucose: normal or slightly elevated (117 mg/dl and 141 mg/dl reported)
lab_values.cerebrospinal_fluid_white_blood_cell_cou: elevated (254 cells/μl and 266 cells/μl reported in one case, predominantly mononuclear cells)
lab_values.cerebrospinal_fluid_red_blood_cell_count: elevated (36 cells/μl and 141 cells/μl reported in one case)
lab_values.cerebrospinal_fluid_protein: elevated (91 mg/dl and 33 mg/dl reported in one case)
lab_values.cerebrospinal_fluid_glucose: slightly decreased (64 mg/dl and 78 mg/dl reported in one case)
lab_values.platelets: normal or slightly elevated (338,000 cells/μl reported in one case)

risk_factors: Contact with rats (at home or work)
Residence or employment in a high-risk environment (slum community or animal farm)
Occupational exposure (e.g., cook working near waste recycling station and pond)

required: Clinical meningitis (fever with severe headache or meningismus)
Negative results for bacterial meningitis on Gram stain, culture isolation, and latex agglutination tests
Positive Leptospira blood culture or MAT with >4-fold acute-convalescent titer rise; seroconversion (undetectable acute-phase titer and convalescent-phase titer >1:200); or sample titer >1:800
supportive: Positive PCR for Leptospira spp. in CSF
